text: Yā pana bhikkhunī mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 164. Should any bhikkhunī have a bed or bench upholstered, it (the upholstery) is to be torn off and confessed.
